alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Grant; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN KENTON, CAMPBELL, SOUTHERN BOONE, NORTHEASTERN GRANT, NORTHERN PENDLETON AND SOUTHWESTERN CLERMONT COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Butler, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Walton, Claryville, Amelia, Crittenden, New Richmond, Dry Ridge, Butler, Mentor, Moscow, Neville, California, Mount Auburn, Visalia, Atwood, Grants Lick, Northcutt, New Palestine, Bracht and Gubser Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
